emptyState.title: Welcome to Pixuli
emptyState.description: Start managing your image library by adding a repository source

step1.title: Choose Storage Platform
step1.description: Select GitHub or Gitee as your image storage repository

step2.title: Fill Repository Info
step2.description: Enter repository owner, name, branch, and access token

step3.title: Start Using
step3.description: After configuration, you can upload and manage images
